text:
Accessing the "Related Projects" link on this page:
http://cocoon.apache.org/lenya/community/index.html
I get this result:

Cocoon 2 - Resource not Found
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
type resource-not-found
message Page Not Available.
description The requested resource couldn't be found.
sender org.apache.cocoon.bean.CocoonBean
source Cocoon commandline (Main.java)
request-uri
community/related-projects.html
missing-file
community/related-projects.html
creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
gregor@apache.org
text:
i fixed it in the sources. the next site update will take care of it on the live
site too.
